title: Morphological and chemical changes in nuclear graphite target under vacuum and high-temperature conditions
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Stefania De Rosa, Elisabetta Colantoni, Paolo Branchini, Domizia Orestano, Antonio Passeri, Gianlorenzo Bussetti, Lisa Centofante, Stefano Corradetti, Martina Marsotto, Chiara Battocchio, Cristina Riccucci, Luca Tortora
